definition: the Save the Nation Anti-Japanese Protest Movement stemming from the Manchurian railway incident of 18th July 1931 九一八事變|九一八事变
pinyin: Kang4 Ri4 Jiu4 wang2 Yun4 dong4

definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
to die/to lose/to be gone/to flee/deceased
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: At the critical moment, he plunged himself into the anti-Japanese war.
sentences.chinese: 在民族危機時刻他奮起投入了抗日救亡運動。
